nodes.text: Slainte was an Imperial Cargo ferry that arrived at the Elliirad Platform to pick up Glavsled while the platform was under attack by a Rebel Alliance strike force consisting of Y-wings what were targeting the freighters, A-wings attempting to provide starfighter support for the Y-wings and a commando unit in a stolen Escort shuttle intending to destroy the station with explosives.
The outcome depends on what happens during the mission, it is either destroyed or escapes into hyperspace.
